website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking pair of boots, but they seem to have more going for them when it comes to aesthetics versus durability, comfort, and fit.
pros: These attractive boots come in several colors, which make them a great match for almost any outfit you'd like to pair with boots
cons: Some owners gripe about durability issues such as flimsy leather and fraying seams, which spark authenticity concerns
Known to rub on the calf muscles
fits some men too narrow, but many more too large

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Fit first, Im 11D and 10.5D fits perfect. If you want to roll with inserts then get your normal size. If you like the leather footbed go down 1/2 size to start. Man are these some good looking boots! Comfy too. They blow iron rangers away on comfort. Once broken in these will go in the rotation of my work boots (iron rangers and beckmans). I got the 875's and must say the color is noice!! Just got em so if anything changes i will update
customer_reviews.author: CACTICALMAIN

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Redwing inserts for best comfort
customer_reviews.text: The original size 10 boots I received were a little narrow resulting in a tight fit on the top of my foot. I ordered a wider boot in a size 10 and they fit excellent. I then purchased the Redwing sole inserts and they are much more comfortable for all day wear. The break-in time was about four days of wearing the boots. They are comfortable and look great. Redwing has an excellent leather treatment that keeps them looking good and water resistant. My first pair of Redwing boots lasted 22 years. This pair will most likely outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: Carl S. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for casual or work.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review these boots until after I’ve had enough time to wear them. I initially bought them for casual wear and replaced the laces with gold/brown round laces, but will also wear them in the shop/garage when working on my motorcycle or vehicle. The leather is very stiff and I immediately applied mink oil to the boots and wore them around the house or when running short errands to get them broke in. I also followed the recommendations to order a half size up and add a foot insert. These are sturdy, high quality boots that I now wear daily. Good boot and they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dpandr66

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot! This is my husband’s second pair. They are great quality, and are built to last. The only annoying part is that they are very hard to break in, BUT once you break them in, they are so comfortable! Very trendy too!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots.
customer_reviews.text: Best way to break them in without killing your feet is to submerge the tip of the boot in very hot water for an hour, i kept swapping the water once it cools off and after that use mink oil and add about two coats on each boot it will feel a lot more comfortable and easier to form fit the boot. So the design is great i love them and the quality of the leather is amazing it will last a very long time. personally once the souls wear down ill have them shipped to a cobbler to replace them for as long as the leather holds up. The price is expensive but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Joezombi74

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot! Get The Right Size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this heritage boot! According to a video (watched after I bought boots), size half size down if a D stay in D width. May need to size down a whole size if going EE. I wear a 12 in almost everything and a 13 in Nike. The 11 1/2 was perfect. Tight in width, great in toe box, stretches to the perfect fit. Great boot, made well, fits great, American Made! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Painful Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I stand all day in a repair shop and have had many premium pairs of shoes for work . In recent years i have made a very conscious effort to buy AMERICAN goods . I have bought many pairs of Double H Cowboy boots and have been super pleased with the comfort and this time iv'e decided i wanted a pair of redwings . Well these boots look absolutely wonderful but unfortunately they are cripplingly uncomfortable . Even after buy gel inserts they are not wearable for work . What a waste of money .
customer_reviews.author: euotech

customer_reviews.title: Red Wing buyer for Life!
customer_reviews.text: Boot quality can not be matched when it comes to redwing heritage boots. This is my 2nd pair of red wings and i will probably by their heritage boots the rest of my life. Wanted a good pair of moc toes for a long time and cant think of anyone who makes a more attractive and quality pair than these. Very classic design and color. Color looks better and better everyday as i get little scuffs here and there darkening up just the right spots.
customer_reviews.author: High Speed Low Drag

customer_reviews.title: But them
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair - they need to have some break in period but once they are stretched and molded to your feet (it doesn’t take long) they fit and feel better than any show I ha e ever owned - great product
customer_reviews.author: tomy

customer_reviews.title: Size is just a number.
customer_reviews.text: Proceed with extreme caution when buying these without trying them on first. Assuming you have the same foot shape as me and also happen to be intimately familiar with Vans Authentics, go 1.5 sizes smaller with these. I wear a 10.5 in Vans and a 9 in these. Buy them snug or else you’ll feel like you’re wearing clown boots once the leather stretches out. All that aside, you’ll love these. They exude quality and craftsmanship and just look super cool. The black upper and white sole is striking. Anticipate a rough time breaking these in.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Had to struggle to get one foot in. Sole dirty inside and out. Very narrow fit. Box arrived taped with scotch tape. Will be returning and seeking a refund
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, great leather. I have a very wide foot and the 13W is actually almost too big, but it's worth it. Never had a pair of shoes that were almost too big, so I enjoy the room. Classic redwing leather and color
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to purchase these boots for many years. As the other comments suggested I ordered a half size down. That was the correct thing to do. The boots fit tight out of the box and are already starting to break in as expected. The first few days have been pretty rough, but I know that’s just part of the process. I look forward to years of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pizzasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Order down a half size
customer_reviews.text: Great craftsmanship runs large had to send back. Definitely order down a half size
customer_reviews.author: William Frykberg

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Red Wing boots. They really are outstanding. I've worn Doc's, two types of Frye boots, Clarks and these rank as equal or better. I read that Red Wing was changing the black moc toe boot to a different style of leather. Glad I got these before they are no longer available. They will take a few wearings to break in, which could be painful. But after that they will be molded to the exact form of your foot. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: They are smaller than advertised but an amazing shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's redwing. That's all I need to say. But, unlike many redwings that you should totally size down a size with, I shouldn't have with these. I needed to exchange for my normal size. I think it's because the toebox comes to a point much more quickly than other boots.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan M.

customer_reviews.title: Red wing 875
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect pair of boots for whatever you are doing- work, play, going out etc. Order a half size smaller and they will fit perfect. Wear thick socks during break in period and wear them as often as you can at first to get them soft and broken in. This is my third pair of Red Wings. Timeless classic.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots came very stiff with a very hard insole and even then it didn’t take long to break them in plus the insole is the right shape that it doesn’t make my feet hurt. I’ve had the boots for about two months and and they’ve kept their shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them! Beautiful boots and pure quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! Beautiful boots and pure quality. Like others have said, they do run large. I usually wear an 11, ordered a half size smaller and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: uphoto75

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable / well made boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable. I normally wear 11.5 - 12m and I bought size 11 wide. I could have probably went with 10.5 wide. The color is lighter in person than in picture, but you can see a better picture on Red Wing website. This was my first pair of boots and I will be sticking with boots in future as a daily wear. The inside sole is harder than expected, but I can wear them all day without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: compliments from everyone
customer_reviews.text: this is one boots that everyone need. i get compliments everywhere I go, even from people who does not know much about boots. Takes a while to break in, so make sure you have thick socks. I bought 1/2 size down and it fits almost perfect - almost because one of my foot is a little wider. It's still a 5 star from me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size not true
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a 9.5, but 9 worked better. 2E, yet toes still in question. heel loose. they seem very comfortable as far as impact when walking, so will keep. otherwise, not sure 300+ was well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red Wings, 'nuff said
customer_reviews.text: They're Red Wing Moc toes, what more can I say? Order one half size down from normal shoe size and enjoy them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA.  But labor is low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA. But quality control is low. Left boot has thumb size leather blemish on toe area very visible and I am sure how it can pass quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: My New Go-To Footwear!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of redwing boots and I couldn't be happier. I live near Seattle, WA where the weather is usually wet. It gets dark around 5pm during winter and its hard to see the puddles while moving around outside. Unlike my other shoes/boots, these keep my feet nice and dry! They're great for most occasions and after a month the compliments keep rolling in! If you're an adult and still wearing the same ole basketball shoes, vans or chucks; its time to grow up and get yourself a quality pair of boots!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Healy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for a week so I'm still breaking them in. The leather is amazing! Somewhat stiff but I'm sure they will soften up as they break in. I really love the soles, they are soft and super comfortable. I have a pair of iron Rangers and I got them in a 9 1\2 and they fit perfectly but if I needed to put in an insole they probably will not fit. I bought these in a 10 and they still fit great so I guess you need to try them on yourself and figure out what you like personally. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lalo

customer_reviews.title: My First RW - fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research since there is no RW store in my country and the only way to get is thru online. A lot of people say is to size 1 down, but the RW site says size down half. I managed to go to a local shoe store and have my feet measured by a Brannock device. I decided to follow the RW to size down half only. I'm glad it worked! Fits perfectly. This is my first RW, so happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lexx SL

customer_reviews.title: Need broke in but there worth it
customer_reviews.text: I just received today so there snug but I just bought some red wing iron rangers they we’re the same way but after a month they feel great. So if your willing to suck up the pain for a week or two I think you’ll be glad you did. I’ll do another review in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Vance R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, most high quality boots you can buy and they are still made in the USA. I will remain a loyal customer. Worth every penny. Traveled around the world with these as my only shoe and they help up perfectly. Still using my old pair.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: i am from Singapore and visited Red Wing Shop back at home however in the Asian market they only come in Single "E" sizes. As i have a slightly wider feet a true to size US9 EE would fit me just fine rather than buying a US10 E that will make me look like Ronald Macdonalds. Again including shipping fee its about USD60 dollars cheaper than buying from shops in Singapore!
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great Redwing quality!
customer_reviews.text: got these boots as a birthday gift for my brother who has really wide feet. I got him a 9.5 double E and they actually fit him! great redwind heritage quality as usual. boots look great.
customer_reviews.author: Nrc

customer_reviews.title: Super shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my fiancé and he really loves them. They take a little bit of time to break them in but it is so very worth it. These are great and will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Run Narrow! Any folks with wide feet considering this product, take note,
customer_reviews.text: Ran narrower than I anticipated. Boots fit a bit tight depending on sock thickness and whether or not I’ve been on my feet all day. Longer days result in more discomfort in my feet. I suggest taking extra consideration for your personal foot width. First couple days are painful, no getting around that. Otherwise think these boots offer a handsome look and durable quality
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Red wing boots
customer_reviews.text: boots are well made and look great. One boot has distressed marks and other doesn’t. Overall happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: So far the best
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and craftsmanship. The more I wear them the better they fit, like everyone says. We'll see how they hold up to cow manure and the Central Texas blackland clay.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: They're just as good a people say they are. Buy a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Onion Rings

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot. The only point is that the price is changing every hour. Unfortunately I bought it with $240, while two days later, before I receiving it, the price dropped to 224. So for anyone who wants to buy it, be aware of the price! :)
customer_reviews.author: Xu Gao

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support, very soft and nice feeling leather
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support, very soft and nice feeling leather, the soul is very balanced and strong. It looks heavy in the picture but is very light on!
customer_reviews.author: UptownArmen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but runs large.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 10.5 or 11 but I had to order a size 10 in these. Excellent boot, very well made. I will have these for many a years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fam

customer_reviews.title: The boots look really good! They aren't the most comfortable option out there ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots look really good! They aren't the most comfortable option out there though. I had to add rubber sole inserts to soften them up for walking. Also make sure that you wear tall and thick socks to protect your shins while wearing. NO ANKLE SOCKS. Even with these two, they are still a little bit uncomfortable on the feet while lounging around. It's the price you pay for these good looking shoes though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for a great price. Be patient during break in, become like sneakers. Style is rockin too. If you treat it with boot oil the color will darken significantly but temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking but......
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking boot. Great color and nicely stitched. Athletic cut. But could not get it in an E width which allows me to wear thicker socks for warmth and to prevent chaffing from stiffness. Also Red Wings sole just isn't as comfortable as the Vibram sole. This boot just isn't the quality of an equally priced Chippewa boot.
customer_reviews.author: Beachdood

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but very expensive so far worth the price, will see how they are over the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one size smaller than normal as suggested and fit perfect with insert, great to wear all day very comfortable and good ankle support. Ordered the mink oil, after fit was good and it keeps boots very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Silver49

customer_reviews.title: One of the best American Made boots
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great customer service, this boots smells great, durable and will last for yeaaaaars
customer_reviews.author: Art A.

customer_reviews.title: But 1/2 size smaller!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, love the feel of it, just wish I would have researched more on the sizing. The redwing website says these boots fit a 1/2 size large, now I'm returning these boots for a refund instead of an exchange because they are all out of my size and in the color I want. Also the price of the shoe jumped $80!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, looks great, and wears well.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great boots, and the toe area fits well for me with wider feet. Comfy and classy, and not quite so 'work boot' looking as Redwing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Very good boot. As with all RedWings, you will need to take care of the leather yourself, but they are very good looking boots and feel great. I normally wear an 11, heard they ran a bit big, so I ordered a 10.5. Should have gone with a 10 but it's not a huge deal. Just go with a full size smaller if you need a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Hauck

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: redwing 875! very good looking boots. people say go a size down but i went true to size since im gonna use insoles and it fits perfectly. i think it would have been really tight in terms of the width if i went a size or half a size down! i got the shoes from Walk into Fashion. VERY GOOD customer service and the price was SIGNIFICANTLY lower than others!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Men’s work boots
customer_reviews.text: The boot was so nice and Brad loved them but they too were too big. I want to exchange them for a size 10. I apologize for this is the second time I have had to return them. He b was really bummed out. Will you pl err are exchange them ? Thank you, Janet Brooks
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome old-school boot. Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome frigging boot, I slapped on some huberd's shoe grease to darken them up and more importantly protect them. These boots are ligit, not as comfortable as Irish setters but look 1,000 times better. I wear the setters for work (cell tower construction) and wear these and the redwing heritage roughneck out to play..... Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: dan dutra

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for my PICKY dad as a gift and he LLLOOOOVVVEEEDDDD them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my PICKY dad as a gift and he LLLOOOOVVVEEEDDDD them. No complains whatsoever. They're extremely nicely made too.
customer_reviews.author: Soso9666

customer_reviews.title: They are incredibly stylish and I like them so much I ordered a pair of shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes instantly feel solid. They are incredibly stylish and I like them so much I ordered a pair of shoe trees to keep them nice and straight. I think mine might be a little large, but I have humongous feet and I can't imagine I'd do better size-wise.
customer_reviews.author: Eggplant Pete

customer_reviews.title: Long break in time but worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow these took forever to break in. They actually caused me quite a bit of pain for several weeks while trying to break them in. I actually gave up for a few months and was going to sell them but decided to give them another chance. Thankfully I did and now I wear them almost every day. They are good solid boots but you definitely have to plan on a lengthy break in period.
customer_reviews.author: JoeD78

customer_reviews.title: Great boots! Very comfortable (once they are broken in)
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Very comfortable (once they are broken in). Be sure to treat the leather prior to wearing them as it may have dried a bit during storage. I recommend this to start prior to wearingI applied two coatings and the leather soaked it up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Benson

customer_reviews.title: The boots are amazing. They do run quite large
customer_reviews.text: The boots are amazing. They do run quite large. I initially ordered a half size smaller than my normal size and exchanged them for a full size smaller. These boots should fit like athletic shoes, so be sure to get your correct size for the best experience.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brett Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great boots. Need some break-in time
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Need some break-in time. Don't plan to wear them all day for at least a few days. I found that aggressively kneading the top of the boot helped with breakin. Put some Obenauf's on to start with, and these should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: CriscoLord

customer_reviews.title: Tight on my ankles and felt like walking on hard concrete
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to buy Redwings you must know your size. I usually wear 11-11.5. I bought these in 11-too big. Got 10.5 which I had not worn since freshman year in high school. They were tight on my big toe and pinky toe. Tight on my ankles and felt like walking on hard concrete. After 1 month of killing my feet they started to fit like a baseball mitt, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Best  Boot Ever Made.
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot. This Pair of Redwing Boots are my second pair in 27 years. Still have the first pair I purchased in 1993 and resoled 3 time. Just can’t seem to part with my Red Wings
customer_reviews.author: Chris Krastes

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing scale
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a 9.5 and need a wide size, get the 8.5wide
customer_reviews.author: Zack G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Over all pretty nice. I usually wear size 10.5 or 11, I got the 10.5 EE and they are a bit loose but when I put an insert in, it seems ok
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: You are getting a high quality boot when you buy redwing.
customer_reviews.text: High quality,soft leather, fits perfectly. The cost of the boot is high but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: danny g.

customer_reviews.title: the quality of the boots is amazing, but they run really big
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the boots is amazing, but they run really big, i'm a 12w in Merrells, and am an 11w in redwings.
customer_reviews.author: 2A

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color, Wrong Size = You're On Your Own.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in Briar, 12ee. They arrived in black, size 12d. I live outside the country and sending these back would cost so much that I might as well be stuck with ill-fitting wrong-colored shoes. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell of quality leather.
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot, but wish they had some arch support. Fortunately, can but insert 😃
customer_reviews.author: noisy coqui frogs

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of red wing heritage, in several styles. Best boots on the market
customer_reviews.author: Hidden Wheel

customer_reviews.title: It's nice that there are shoes still made with quality and that you can re-sole.
customer_reviews.text: Your going to need a good pair of shoes moving forward
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tamburello

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are comfortable and stylish. Great looking boots!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Just make sure you break them in ...
customer_reviews.text: I regularly wear 9s, and I ordered 8.5, that seems about right. Great shoes. Just make sure you break them in first. Get some mink oil or leather conditioner, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product very thick leather. Fit is 1/2 size smaller than my regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colors. What a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I got the wrong color combination. Why a pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: roberto santos-williams

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: They run about 1⁄2 size large. I'm a solid 12-M in most footwear. I ordered an 11.5-M and the fit spot on. After they break in I may be able to fit in an arch support insole.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo P.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Good looking boot. Takes 2 weeks of wear to break in. Get some moleskin to get you past the hot spots during the break in period. Otherwise, very well made right here in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and I can tell they will last for a long time. Highly recommend for construction professionals
customer_reviews.author: ssa5108

customer_reviews.title: Two different sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I received one size 11.5 and one size 9.5. Neither boot came with an insole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good 👌
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described, the material feels a little thin so we'll see how long they last and if they're worth the coin we spent.
customer_reviews.author: jahrice

customer_reviews.title: Needs Speedlaces
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes and their quality. Would have given 5 stars, but Red Wing needs to start putting speedlaces on more than just Iron Rangers.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 1907 Copper Rough and Tough and I love them. I ordered 11D (same as my 1907s) ...
customer_reviews.text: So these 8890's Charcoal Rough and Toughs just arrived. They are gorgeous as expected. I have and wear daily a similar boot, 1907 Copper Rough and Tough and I love them. I ordered 11D (same as my 1907s) and the length is as expected HOWEVER, the width is fully .25" to .5" narrower than my 1907s. Is this normal anyone else experiencing this? Pic attached. Thanks in advance.
customer_reviews.author: lbrentg

customer_reviews.title: Returning for the right width.
customer_reviews.text: Boots were too narrow even at 2e. I work as a shipping clerk.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the boots based on my shoe size for New Balance shoes and previous Meindl boots. I wear sofsole inserts or custom orthotics because I am on my feet all day. If I did't wear an insole insert then maybe I would order a half size smaller. I normally wear a size 12 and that is what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell C. Preston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with Redwing the fit specially the looks😎👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: EricV

customer_reviews.title: Runs large will change review after I get the rights size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 10.5 EE. NEED 9.5 EE. Was always a 10 1/2 with redwing however this boot has been an exception.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Shaw

customer_reviews.title: wings beneath my feet
customer_reviews.text: as expected, Red Wings is truly a shoe legend. I have been using this brand since 1992 and it never ceases to amaze me of the workmanship and quality of the shoes. You will never regret buying any red wings shoes!
customer_reviews.author: chapopot!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs big
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking shoes, order a size down than what you usually wear
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe but runs a little larger then I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe but runs a little larger then I expected and I have been wearing Red Wings most of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Cloz

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a half a size down, fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12, order a 11.5d and they fit perfect! Certainly a breaking in period. But you get through that, you've got a great pair of formed boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boot
customer_reviews.text: Red wings are hands down the best work boot available they are pretty pricey but I think well worth it they do have a tough break in period but after they are broken in your never take them off
customer_reviews.author: rick camacho

customer_reviews.title: the best shoe in the world. period.
customer_reviews.text: the quality and style is amazing. based on the reviews I ordered 1/2 size smaller and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near as comfortable. These are too heavy especially when walking on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Chukas for long time. Nowhere near as comfortable. These are too heavy especially when walking on rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: José Orozco

customer_reviews.title: RedWing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Runs a lil big but better than running small. Overall great boot ..
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: absolutely no complaints. Fits as expected and is holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tenny

customer_reviews.title: Even during break in they have been comfortable wearing all day
customer_reviews.text: I use Superfeet insoles so I got 1/2 size larger than my measured size. This has consistently worked when buying Redwing boots or shoes. They're very stiff but are breaking in with treatments of Obenaufs. Even during break in they have been comfortable wearing all day
customer_reviews.author: Warrdunc

customer_reviews.title: Price was awesome. First day is the worst then they start ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the were fake. Price was awesome. First day is the worst then they start to break in. Idk I work in them everyday and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Dillon T

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes! Bought this shoes a few years back, changed the soles twice but still going strong and looking good! Wear it when I ride my bike daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny.C

customer_reviews.title: these guys just don't fit like any other shoe I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: i had to send them back, second pair..... these guys just don't fit like any other shoe I've ever worn!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how or why these are such great sellers. Purchased less than 90 days ago and the soles are 80% gone!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Got the 8138 from Amazon...
customer_reviews.text: Red Wing Boots are just the best! Like what most reviewers would say, Yes Red Wing Boots will take a long time to break-in... and Yes it will be BEST Boots that you would own... Give it a good oiling before wear and it would save you alot of pain! I personally use Red Wing's All Natural Boot Oil. Got the 8138 from Amazon and have 9196, 8131 and 8890 in my collection. So I do know what I'm taking about...
customer_reviews.author: Chris V.

customer_reviews.title: they run huge
customer_reviews.text: the size is way too big and I can't figure out a return. Pissed off! They are awesome if they were right
customer_reviews.author: ALday

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, a bit snug.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots -- a bit snug. Seem durable and sturdy. I'd recommend some sort of after-market gel insole for support. Great for stomping in leaves and look good while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W

customer_reviews.title: Most likely will need an insole
customer_reviews.text: Good boot, no Frills about it. Pretty much leather and rubber. Kind of pricey. But seems to be made out of quality products
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great and Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This boots are well built,Beautiful,soft and very comfortable.The Leather is very soft with very strong stitches.I usually wear 8.5 and bought size 8 and fits perfectly. This boots looks like they are going to last me for a Long time. Go Red Wing!!
customer_reviews.author: Federico.

product_meta.title: Red Wing Heritage Men's Classic Moc 6" Boot
product_meta.description:
A crepe wedge serves as the foundation for this durable, yet handsome moc-toe boot. Stain and perspiration resistant

This boot from Red Wing Shoes is made to complement a casual lifestyle. The rugged look features a thick, treaded outsole, while the leather upper is waterproof. The Norwegian welt construction adds strength and durability.

For almost a century, Red Wing Shoes has been producing top-quality work boots and shoes. It started with a corner store in the quiet river town of Red Wing, Minn. Today, Red Wing Shoes produces thousands of handmade shoes every day, making their legendary quality available worldwide. A true American success story, Red Wing Shoes provided footwear for the U.S. Military in both World Wars. Norman Rockwell created artwork for the company during the 1960s. And in the new global economy, Red Wing Shoes continues to evolve to meet the needs of a new generation, with more than 150 styles perfect for work or play. Red Wing Shoes is legendary for producing tough, durable footwear that can handle any challenge. Their shoes and boots are created with four principles in mind: quality, durability, comfort, and craftsmanship. Each is given a hand inspection before being sent out the door, to ensure that it meets Red Wing Shoes' exacting standards. And the quality of their footwear is guaranteed. So look to Red Wing Shoes first for footwear that lasts.

See more
feature_bullets: Care Tips: Light Cleaning:Use warm water and a soft bristle brush to remove stuck-on dirt. Then use a clean, dry cloth to wipe away any remaining excess dirt. Proper conditioning helps preserve the finish and life of your footwear.
Outsole - Traction Tred Cushion Crepe Wedge
